item.title: WBD
item.description: score:-29 Chances: Warner Bros. Discovery expects success with the ‘Barbie’ movie, predicting a rise in gross billings. Warner Bros. Discovery to offer free live sports on Max, potentially attracting a larger audience. Mark Thompson appointed as Chairman and CEO of CNN Worldwide, signaling a potential growth phase.
